sn36.17:1.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn36.17:1.2: “katama nu kho, bhante, vedana, katamo vedanasamudayo, katamo vedananirodho, katama vedananirodhagamini patipada?
sn36.17:1.3: Ko vedanaya assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranan”ti?
sn36.17:1.5: sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana—
sn36.17:1.9: Ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo vedananirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
sn36.17:1.11: Yam vedanam paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam, ayam vedanaya assado.
sn36.17:1.12: Yam vedana anicca dukkha viparinamadhamma, ayam vedanaya adinavo.
sn36.17:1.13: Yo vedanaya chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam, idam vedanaya nissaranam.
sn36.17:2.1: Atha kho pana, bhikkhave, maya anupubbasankharanam nirodho akkhato.
sn36.17:2.2: Pathamam jhanam samapannassa vaca niruddha hoti …pe…
sn36.17:2.3: khinasavassa bhikkhuno rago niruddho hoti, doso niruddho hoti, moho niruddho hoti.
sn36.17:2.4: Atha kho pana, bhikkhave, maya anupubbasankharanam vupasamo akkhato.
sn36.17:2.5: Pathamam jhanam samapannassa vaca vupasanta hoti …pe…
sn36.17:2.6: khinasavassa bhikkhuno rago vupasanto hoti, doso vupasanto hoti, moho vupasanto hoti.
sn36.17:2.8: Pathamam jhanam samapannassa vaca patippassaddha hoti.
sn36.17:2.9: Dutiyam jhanam samapannassa vitakkavicara patippassaddha honti.
sn36.17:2.10: Tatiyam jhanam samapannassa piti patippassaddha hoti.
sn36.17:2.11: Catuttham jhanam samapannassa assasapassasa patippassaddha honti.
sn36.17:2.12: Sannavedayitanirodham samapannassa sanna ca vedana ca patippassaddha honti.
sn36.17:2.13: Khinasavassa bhikkhuno rago patippassaddho hoti, doso patippassaddho hoti, moho patippassaddho hoti”ti.
